name: .MOZLZ4
summary: Learn about .MOZLZ4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Mozilla Firefox with the "mozlz4-edit" add-on installed

instructions: MOZLZ4 files are not meant to be manually opened. Instead, they are referenced by Firefox to load user profile settings. You can delete the files if they become too numerous and large, but you will lose information regarding your user profile.
If you need to modify a MOZLZ4 file, you can open, edit, and save MOZLZ4 files using Firefox with the "mozlz4-edit" add-on installed.
